name: charfunk
description: CharFunk provides some of the functionality that Java's Character class does.  Many of these things would be difficult to do in JavaScript without very unweildy RegExps or using [XRegExp](http://xregexp.com/).  For example, it lets you test whether unicode characters in the Basic Multilingual Plane (0000 to FFFF) are letters or digits.
author: Joe Larson <joelarson4@gmail.com> (http://joewlarson.com/)
